Overview

Local SEO is not “set it and forget it.” Regular maintenance ensures your Google Business Profile, website, and citations stay accurate and effective.

Checklist

  • Schedule quarterly audits of GBP, website, and citations
  • Track ranking improvements for target keywords and locations
  • Review review velocity and engagement regularly
  • Monitor for errors, duplicates, or suspensions on GBP
  • Document updates and changes for accountability
